question:
Kujula Kadphises established his supremacy over which of the following areas?
1) Kabul
2) KandaharÂ 
3) Afghanistan
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Kushans were most probably one of the five branches of the Yuezhi confederation. Kujula Kadphises was the first Yuezhi chief and he laid the foundation of the Kushana Empire in India. He established his supremacy over Kabul, Kandahar, and Afghanistan.
